body:
Sometimes when shutting off bitcoind it can take a while to dump the mempool transaction onto the disk so
this change adds additional logging to the `DumpMempool` method in `kernel/mempool_persist.cpp`

Similar to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29227 this 
 - adds a maximum of 10 new log lines
 - logs the progress for every 10%

This is in response to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29227#issuecomment-1893375082

The logs will now look like this
```
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z scheduler thread exit
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Dumping 468 mempool transactions to disk...
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 10% (tried 47, 421 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 20% (tried 94, 374 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 30% (tried 141, 327 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 40% (tried 188, 280 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 50% (tried 234, 234 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 60% (tried 281, 187 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 70% (tried 328, 140 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 80% (tried 375, 93 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Progress dumping mempool transactions to disk: 90% (tried 422, 46 remaining)
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Writing 0 unbroadcast transactions to disk.
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Dumped mempool: 0.000986089s to copy, 0.03434s to dump
2024-02-07T13:03:55Z Flushed fee estimates to fee_estimates.dat.
```
title: mempool: Loading progress added for dumping mempool transactions to disk
